Device orientation Choose a video to play Tap to open a video file. Long tap to load external subtitles. Load subtitles Details Files app is disabled or missing To automatically load external subtitles or enable skipping to next file in a directory, grant %s access to the topmost folder containing your videos (e.g. Movies). Delete this file\? Delete Settings General Auto frame rate matching Switch display refresh rate to match video frame rate Do not change display refresh rate Tunneled playback Tunneling provides better support for 4K/HDR content, but may not work on all devices Auto picture-in-picture Switch to PiP when leaving the app Do not automatically switch to PiP Skip silence Skip parts with silence on the audio stream Play content as is Repeat toggle Extra control to allow indefinitely loop video (requires app restart) Dolby Vision profile 7 fallback Play Dolby Vision profile 7 content on HDR displays Play UHD Blu-ray content containing Dolby Vision as is Videos Open Resize Rotate Picture-in-picture File access Auto No video files found Dangerous ⚠️ Switching options in this category may break playback of normally compatible content Shortcuts Captioning preferences Decoder priority Prefer device decoders (default) Prefer app decoders Device decoders only Default audio track Device languages Default Subtitle Embedded styles Apply embedded subtitle styles Do not apply embedded subtitle styles Bold style Use bold typeface as regular Use default regular typeface Genres Random Inject
